definition: the popular taste at a given time, turn sharply
details:
noun
- the popular taste at a given time
= synonyms: style
- a general tendency to change (as of opinion)
= example: a general tendency to change (as of opinion)
= synonyms: movement
- general line of orientation
= synonyms: course
- a general direction in which something tends to move
= synonyms: tendency
verb
- turn sharply
= synonyms: curve
